Feature.Name: Moon-Touched Sword
Feature.Text: In darkness, the unsheathed blade of this sword sheds moonlight, creating bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

MagicProperty.Name: Moon-Touched Sword
MagicProperty.Description: In darkness, the unsheathed blade of this sword sheds moonlight, creating bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.
